website_summaries.verdict: A winning Mod style from a collaboration with New York designer Samantha Pleet.
pros: 2.5-inch heel adds just the right amount of height
Come in several fun colors – we particularly liked the retro turquoise, and some loved them so much that they bought the set
Comfortable right out of the box
cons: The boots are a bit clompy on hard surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots although I can't wear them all day. I normally wear a 7.5 but bought these in an 8. The fit is great with socks and just a wee bit loose with none. The arch almost hits where it should, but is just a wee bit too short when standing. I have thick ankles, but these fit perfectly and feel very comfortable at the top of the shaft and are smooth inside where the elastic is. They are easy to get on and off and the color is so pretty. The only thing I don't like is that they clomp on hard floors.
customer_reviews.author: wrknnwfTop Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Good boots! Ankle gore can get itchy
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a few months now and LOVE them. I get compliments all the time! I've had water and dust splashed on them, but the leather actually takes a fair amount of abuse pretty well, so no need to be precious with them. They're easy to break in and very walkable. The only reason for the four-star rating is that the elastic gore has a plastic seam on the top that does get a little itchy after wearing the shoes for a bit, and will leave a red rub mark on my ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Fritz

customer_reviews.title: The heel heights is exactly what I was looking for and the boots themselves are really cute but because of the fit I don't wear
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in my normal size of 8 but they are a little tight. Definitely made for someone with a narrow foot. They are also a little slick especially on wet surfaces. The heel heights is exactly what I was looking for and the boots themselves are really cute but because of the fit I don't wear them as much as I would like to
customer_reviews.author: Wheels

customer_reviews.title: Slightly small, but look great!
customer_reviews.text: They fit somewhat small, but I hope they will stretch during the break-in period. A half size larger would have been equally uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JLA

customer_reviews.title: Nice ankle boots
customer_reviews.text: Easy to slip on fits a size 8 foot fine. Heel just a little high for me I should have paid more attention when I bought it otherwise a great shoe. Doesn't squeeze anywhere either nice open toe box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the Marmalade
customer_reviews.text: Love. Love. Love. I was looking for an ankle boot in a unique color, and these are perfect. It took about a day to break them in, but they are getting more comfortable with each wear. They were tight at first, but are now very easy to put on. I typically wear a 10 and these fit very well. The stacked heel is easy to walk in and they have a little more tread than other ankle boots I own.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Tunison

customer_reviews.title: I love the color
customer_reviews.text: I love the color. Well made. I did order 8 instead of my regular 7.5 and it was the right choice. I like that the heel is not too low.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful boot. The quality is superb
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful boot. The quality is superb. However, while the size 7 was too snug, the size 7.5 was too roomy and would have required inserts. I returned the product simply because I liked the look of the boot less on me than I did in the pics online. I wanted something a little more slim.
customer_reviews.author: kboz

customer_reviews.title: The perfect shoe boot
customer_reviews.text: I would never, ever have expected Wolverine to create such a flattering feminine boot, but its collaboration with Samatha Pleet is perfect. This is my second pair of this style, shipped from the same distributor and I've been satisfied both times. The price is at minimum at least one-third less than retail. Love, love, love these boots!
customer_reviews.author: Loujul

customer_reviews.title: Great boots and awesome price.
customer_reviews.text: I likely will need to break them in before they will be comfortable enough to wear all day. I think they look great and they will be some of my favorite and most worn shoes. Great price for a great looking pair of boots.
customer_reviews.author: Wnlg

customer_reviews.title: Just get them already
customer_reviews.text: So adorable! I bought these in the turquoise. I get many compliments every time I wear them, from both men and women! I mean, people rave! It's fun. They're really unique and spunky. Surprisingly versatile, too!!
customer_reviews.author: J Kru

customer_reviews.title: Great color, just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great color, just as expected. Didn't need to break in, could wear them right away and walk San Francisco hills with no problems. heel is sturdy and very comfortable! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Aida Sakalauskaite

customer_reviews.title: Great booties
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Fits perfectly and color is exactly like I expected. Packaging was perfect and product was protected through shipping. Thank you for my new booties. Love them!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are very pretty boots, but too narrow for me and have to return.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Wear them all day and still be comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great. Fit is as expected. Comfortable all day long. And the color is unusual enough to make just the right statement. I love these boots for work and for play. I wish they had more colors available. I would definitely purchase again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boots and well-packaged with a polishing cloth. Very classy. My foot does slide down a bit but an insert helps.
customer_reviews.author: Christina S.

customer_reviews.title: Best boots ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought the light blue boots and get compliments every single time I wear them. These are of an extremely high quality and are absolutely gorgeous in person.
customer_reviews.author: Yuuki Saša Yaffe Segher

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boots. They're gorgeous. Picture doesn't do them Justice. I got them right away. I am very satisfied with this company. Thanks for everything!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and fun color!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. True color. Could use better arch support, but I added my own and they worked out well.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes. I was doubtful about them and nervous they wouldn't look good with dress and pants but they really are very versatile. I wear them as much as possible. They are also very well made so I anticipate having them for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: C. S.

customer_reviews.title: Classic Boot With Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the color and quality. Comfortable and stable fit. Would buy in another color. Packaging was really impressive. (Do not post name on this review)
customer_reviews.author: James Cresswell

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are good news!
customer_reviews.text: I have super narrow feet, so it's hard for me to find boots that my foot isn't sliding around in all day. Super professional looking and comfortable. Excellent shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Great bootie
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Awesome color. Wish they have my size in black.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and AWESOME price for a solid leather bootie
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous shoe. Great quality and AWESOME price for a solid leather bootie! Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryleigh Grant

customer_reviews.title: Love these. Lots of compliments (marmalade color)
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Lots of compliments (marmalade color). You might want to slip an insole in for cushioning and support, but they're relatively comfortable straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Emily K Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: super comfy right out of the box! what a beautiful color. very high quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. I wore them all day when I ...
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous boots. Great quality. I wore them all day when I received them and my feet were very happy!
customer_reviews.author: a.n.o.n.y.m.o.u.s

customer_reviews.title: Great boots with suits or jeans
customer_reviews.text: Great boots with suits or jeans. Hard to find this quality without side zippers. More comfortable with socks if your ankles are sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth G Houser

customer_reviews.title: It didn't look good, I sent it back
customer_reviews.text: Bizarrely huge ankle openings--narrow to the sides of your ankle but flapping in the front. It didn't look good, I sent it back. Construction seemed fine but not sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Aliza

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: amazing nude color cant wait for fall and to be able to wear- nice chunky heel
customer_reviews.author: Imwishing

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing and look far more expensive than what I paid. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: IMPOSSIBLE TO WEAR
customer_reviews.text: I have tried on many booties and this one by far was the worst in terms of comfort. It was so rough around the ankle that it was impossible to wear. I should have taken note that a previous reviewer had mentioned this. Now I had to pay ten dollars to return a product that was entirely unsatisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: sjd

customer_reviews.title: Wolverine boots
customer_reviews.text: I returned these boots because the heel was too high to wear all day.
customer_reviews.author: Robinpegg

customer_reviews.title: great shoe overall
customer_reviews.text: I liked these shoes alot i want them in every color!! Ive been searching for the perfect booties and these were them. I was little iffy when purchasing them because of the negative reviews but i thought these shoes to be very comfortable and and i liked the wide ankle opening but if you have really tiny ankles then i would recommend these arent the right product for you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Wolverine Women's 1000 Mile Arc Boot
product_meta.description:
Wolverine is thrilled to partner with enchanting new york designer samantha pleet. The collection marries wolverine's rich heritage with samantha's mystical-meets-modern design aesthetic.

Established in Rockford, Michigan in 1883, Wolverine is an iconic American brand that combines superior materials with timeless craftsmanship. Wolverine boots are built to withstand the toughest of environments and provide all day comfort. Today, Wolverine leads the industry with a relentless commitment to innovation and patented technologies including Wolverine Contour Welt, Wolverine MultiShox, Wolverine Durashocks, Wolverine DuraShocks SR and Wolverine Fusion.
feature_bullets: Wolverine partnered with new york-based designer samantha pleet to create this modern chelsea boot with western-inspired flavor. Foot-coddling features include hidden gussets, a soft, full-grained leather upper and a padded insole
The leather-covered, crest shaped gore is a signature detail and also makes them easy to slip on and off
Stylish and functional design for everyday wear
